name: 8px Flappy
description:
The simplest Flappy Bird you've ever played.

[ Controls ]
Jump - Left Click/Space
Restart - Right Click/R

It's 8 Pixels tall, 8 Pixels wide.

There is no room for fonts, flashy UIs, or anything else except a yellow pixel that jumps up and down.

Have fun!

[ Known Bugs ]

- Sometimes an obstacle will disappear in front of the player. I don't know why because I can't reproduce the bug and I don't care enough because it doesn't really affect the gameplay.
